transcript:
Customer: Har ghar tiranga abhiyan.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Ha so sorry sir call apne aap disconnect ho gaya tha.
Customer: Hmm to main keh raha tha abhi isme ek jo colour ke hisab se hai to steel ke colour mein aur black colour ke andar mein bhi jo hai wo banate hain.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: To aapne abhi matlab koi round jaise aapne ek bataya ki round connectors mein bhi deal karte ho aap to uska check kiya na aapne abhi koi lead aa rahi ho?
Customer: Lead actually to matlab na jo mera product hai na uski lead nahi aa rahi hai koi steel ka spring koi steel ke jaise profile section plastic container connector ki aa rahi hai and glass connector ki aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Handle aa rahe hain aur wo kuch aur bhi item hai jo matlab sony bhi nahi deal nahi karte aur agar koi lead aa bhi rahi hai to wo retail ki hai four piece ek piece do piece ki.
Customer: Chalo wo to baad mein socha jayega na jo cheez mere matlab ki nahi hai to uske bare mein matlab dekhna bhi fir fayda nahi hai uska to.
Executive: Nahi actually mujhe na Sumit ne ye morning mein jab aapki baat hui hai na Sumit se abhi hui hai afternoon mein I think to wo concern share kiya tha maine matlab humne apni internal team mein share kar diya hai ye already.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Mail kara hua hai to thoda sa wait karna padega hume bhi unke mail ka revert aane ke liye.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai to jaisa bhi hota hai hum aapko update karte hain let's suppose jitna jaldi ho sakta hai wo issue resolve karane ki koshish kar rahe hain hum.
Customer: Theek hai ji.
Executive: Theek hai to fir leads to matlab agar main baat karu to leads to aapki matlab wahi aa rahi hai but bahut kam aa rahi hai ye nahi kahenge ki bilkul hi nahi aa rahi hai bahut kam aati hai.
Customer: Ha wo to hai.
Customer: Hmm bahut kam aa rahi hai ji.
Executive: Ha theek hai and actually mere ko jisse suggest kiya tha na mere friend ne India mart karne ke liye to usne mere ko yahi kaha tha ki aap isko apne product daliye to aapke pass automatically customer ke na phone aane shuru ho jayenge.
Executive: Ha ha ha bilkul calls aate hain unka kaun sa product tha matlab jinhone aapko suggest kiya tha?
Customer: Unka ye gloves hote hain operation wale rubber gloves hote hain.
Customer: Rubber mein nahi hote wo polythene mein hota hai wo.
Executive: Ha matlab wo samajh gayi main usme to wo to business line hi dekhi ekdam alag hai.
Customer: Ha alag hai bas wo to ye tha ki chalo mera dost tha to usne suggest kiya tha jab maine nava nava ye kam shuru kiya to.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Is karke.
Executive: Nahi sir aapke bhi leads aap matlab inquiry calls ki agar main baat karu na to aapke pass bhi aayengi aa sakti hain but wahi hai na ki activity bhi ban nahi pa rahi kyuki leads utna jyada generate nahi ho rahi hai.
Executive: Jab aap by leads consumption jyada karte ho na jaise ab aapke pass lead aayegi to aap usse consume karoge client se baat karoge aapki visibility banegi to fir samne se aapke pass aana start hota hai.
Customer: Achcha ji.
Executive: Ha to unhone waise kuch aapko galat suggest nahi kiya hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Halaki unka product line alag hai usme competition bahut jyada hai to uske according uske pass ho sakta hai ki inquiries bahut jyada flow mein aati ho kyuki doctor matlab jante ho koi chota sa blade bhi wo aata hai surgical blade.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To wo kitna demand mein hota hai to waise hi hai.
Executive: Ek bar main leads check kara leti hu bas aapke matlab mujhe product hi confirm aapke karne the ki L shape product hai matlab do shape hai do hi material hai aur do hi colour hai right?
Customer: Hanji hanji.
Executive: Ek silver aur ek black.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Iske alawa kisi product mein deal nahi karte aur ek apna wo round wala product hai.
Customer: Ha actually jo L connector hota hai na isme do shapes aati hai ek L shape aur ek round shape usi ki baat kar raha hu.
Executive: But ye sare glass connector ke andar hi aate hain na sir matlab.
Customer: Glass connector ke andar hi hai sare.
Executive: Okay glass ko connect karne ke liye rokne ke liye hi hote hain sare.
Executive: Samajh gayi.
Executive: Theek hai kyuki glass connector mein to lead hamare pass available hai but particular agar hum L shape glass ki baat karte hain na to usme leads bahut kam hai.
Executive: To maybe shayad wahi problem aap face kar rahe ho.
Customer: Hanji hanji.
Executive: Theek hai and aapne Sumit ki call abhi aayi thi to aapne usse no not satisfied bhi kiya hai sir.
Customer: Ha bas wo thoda sa to mehsoos hua is karke isse pehle maine sab mein okay report diya lekin ab agar mujhe ek bhi customer provide nahi ho raha hai to fir main.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo concern humne actually internally apna raise kar diya hai already but jo call aapke pass aati hai na jaise not satisfied aapne jo kiya hai wo basically executive ke liye hota hai sir jaise Sumit ne aap se baat kari to wo unka tha ki matlab aapki Sumit se interaction kaisi rahi.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ha to aapka raise kar diya hai hum do se teen din aap hume dijiye jo bhi hota hai hum aapko update karte hain na positive response.
Customer: Chalo theek hai ji.
Executive: Okay sir okay thank you.
Customer: Okay okay ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough relevant buyleads.

- Retail buyleads are not useful.

- Dissatisfied with the service.



Resolution:

- Executive has raised the concern internally.

- Assured to resolve the issue.

- Will provide an update in 2-3 days.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide an update in 2-3 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product, satisfaction
